summary:
The PlayStation 5 (PS5) is a video game console made by Sony. It was released in 2020, replacing the PlayStation 4. The PS5 has two versions: one with a disc drive for physical games and a cheaper digital-only model. Both were updated with slimmer designs in 2023.

It has powerful features like a fast SSD for quick loading, 4K graphics, and 3D audio. The DualSense controller adds realistic feedback. The PS5 is compatible with many PS4 games and has a new VR headset, PS VR2. An upgraded Pro model is coming in 2024.
title: PlayStation 5
